meanings.definition: The condition of lacking the ability to hear.
meanings.sent1: Her deafness made it hard for her to enjoy music.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed his deafness at a young age.
meanings.sent3: Despite his deafness, he could still feel the vibrations of the music.
meanings.sent4: The deafness of the night was broken by a sudden loud noise.
meanings.sent5: The profound deafness of the room was eerie and unsettling.

meanings.definition: The state of being unable to hear.
meanings.sent1: The baby's deafness was discovered during a routine check-up.
meanings.sent2: She communicated with him through sign language due to his deafness.
meanings.sent3: The deafness of the situation was comical as they all tried to talk at once.
meanings.sent4: The deafness of the forest at night was calming and peaceful.
meanings.sent5: The sudden deafness of the room silenced all conversation.
